vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.20.1;
son of: Bichri (H1075)
§ Sheba = "seven"
n pr m
1) Benjamite, son of Bichri and one who led a rebellion against David
2) Gadite, brother of Michael, Meshullam, Jorai, Jachan, Zia, and Heber
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   ciudad; territorio de Simeón; (2b)   hijo de Bicrí; tribu de Benjamin; en tiempos de David; (2c)   hombre; tribu de Gad
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性專有名詞
示巴 这个字在原文的意思是 "七"
1) 便雅憫族, 比利基的兒子, 且是帶領反派大衛的人 (撒下 20)
2) 迦得人, 米迦勒,米書蘭,約賴,雅干,細亞,希伯 等人的兄弟 (代上 5:13)
專有名詞, 地名
3) 西緬境內的城鎮
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性专有名词
示巴 这个字在原文的意思是 "七"
1) 便雅悯族, 比利基的儿子, 且是带领反派大卫的人 (撒下 20)
2) 迦得人, 米迦勒,米书兰,约赖,雅干,细亚,希伯 等人的兄弟 (代上 5:13)
专有名词, 地名
3) 西缅境内的城镇

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of be.er she.va (בְּאֵר שֶׁ֫בַע "Beersheba" H0884)
§ Sheba = "seven"
n pr loc
a town in Simeon

A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13;
son of: Abihail (H0032I);
brother of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Jorai (H3140), Jacan (H3275), Zia (H2127) and Eber (H5677H)
§ Sheba = "seven"
n pr loc
a town in Simeon
